compliant.legal provisions: The introduction clearly states the purpose of the legal notice and its relevance to the website's terms of use.

non_compliant.legal provisions: The terms of use do not specify user rights regarding data protection and privacy.
non_compliant.amend: Include explicit user rights and obligations regarding personal data processing and privacy.

non_compliant.legal provisions: The description of website services lacks clarity on data collection and usage practices.
non_compliant.amend: Provide detailed information on what data is collected, how it is used, and the legal basis for processing.
